data.author: Chris Lewis

changelog.release_notes:
v3.0:
- Redesigned for Pebble Time/Steel/Round.
- Voice dictated responses available on Pebble Time/Steel/Round.
- Contacts with multiple numbers can now have those numbers picked from when adding a Favourite contact.
- Responses now sync as soon as contacts window loads for speed.
- Fixed a bug when upgrading to v2.7 on Marshmallow.

v1.6:
- USERS MUST ALSO UPDATE ANDROID APP!
- Compatibility update for Pebble Time.

v2.5.1:
- Potential fix for 'blank window' bug.

v2.5.0:
- No more waiting times!
- Better Favourites picker.
- Better log viewing.

v2.0.0: 
- All users MUST also update Android app from Google Play! 
- Ability to set favourite contacts. 
- Watchapp UI redesign for improved navigation 
- Sync and persistent storage (responses only) improvements.

v1.6.0: - All users MUST also update watchapp from Settings! 
- The maximum length of a response has been raised from 40 to 100 characters.
- Option to auto-start the watchapp when an SMS or phone call is received.
- Option to receive a notification when the SMS send is successful or fails. 
- Sorting the list of responses now triggers a sync of responses where it incorrectly did not previously. 
- The watchapp is now built with SDK 2.0.2.

data.description:
**Requires Android companion from Google Play Store!**

Send customized pre-set (or 'canned') SMS messages from your Pebble! Perfect for times when you need to reply, but it isn't possible to use your phone.

Responses can also be dictated with the microphone!

Add, edit, delete, import and export your list of responses, then choose from them when you open the watchapp. The last contact you received an SMS or Call from is also displayed.

data.title: Wristponder
